triples.name: Collision avoidance
triples.relevance: Core problem that the paper addresses and proposes methods to solve.

triples.name: Convex optimization
triples.relevance: The paper leverages strong duality from convex optimization to reformulate collision avoidance constraints.

triples.name: Constrained optimization
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel method for reformulating nondifferentiable constraints into smooth, differentiable constraints using strong duality.

triples.name: Strong duality
triples.relevance: The mathematical foundation used to exactly reformulate nondifferentiable constraints into smooth ones.

triples.name: Signed distance function
triples.relevance: Traditional technique for trajectory generation that the paper connects and builds upon.

triples.name: Trajectory optimization
triples.relevance: Fundamental trajectory planning problem that the paper's method applies to.

triples.name: Gradient descent
triples.relevance: Example of gradient-based optimization algorithms that can be applied with the smooth constraints.

triples.name: Convex set
triples.relevance: Mathematical concept used to represent obstacles and controlled objects that the method handles.
